name: Stories and Smoke
summary:
Stories and Smoke is a narrative game about confronting yourself, your past, and your community, and choosing how -- or if -- you will return to your society. What soured the relationship with your people, during your training as a Bard? How will you move forward with your life, and reintegrate your story? How do you feel about the Other who is in here with you?

Who will walk out of the shrine?
